description:
Description


GENTLE&EFFECTIVE EXFOLIATION: Our Toner features 2% PHA and LHA, the same powerful ingredients used in dermatological peels, to gently remove dead skin cells and smooth rough patches without over-exfoliating. Enjoy a refined complexion with reduced roughness and enhanced skin clarity after just one use.
QUICK ABSORPTION & DEEP RELIEF: Utilizing patented Rapid-Some Technology, our toner absorbs swiftly into the skin, delivering active ingredients 2.46 times deeper and faster. Experience immediate relief and enhanced results when paired with a serum for a complete skincare routine.
HYPOALLERGENIC & SENSITIVE SKIN APPROVED: With a 0.00 skin irritation index and rigorous sensitivity testing, this toner is ideal for acne-prone and sensitive skin. It effectively clears away old sebum and dead skin cells while preserving your skin’s moisture barrier.
SOOTHING & MOISTURIZING: Infused with a refreshing water-based formula, Nosca9 Soothing Toner not only exfoliates but also soothes and hydrates your skin. It reduces sebum and heat sensation, providing a cooling effect and immediate comfort upon application.
ADVANCED DERMATOLOGICAL CARE: Featuring Sodium Heparin—a rare, high-priced ingredient known for its exceptional skin benefits—this toner offers superior care and improvement. It effectively reduces uneven skin texture, sebum, and oil volume, enhancing overall skin health and appearance.
 
How To Use

1. Apply a proper amount on skin and tap for absorption.

2. For pore care, soak the cotton pads with toner and leave on concerned areas for 2-3 minutes.
 
Key Ingredients

Water, 2,3-Butanediol, Ethoxydiglycol, Gluconolactone, 1,2-Hexanediol, Glycerin, Methylpropanediol, Tromethamine, Glycereth-26, Caprylyl Glycol, Chlorella Vulgaris Extract, Glucose, Panthenol, Butylene Glycol, Fructooligosaccharides, Fructose, Octyldodeceth-16, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sodium Phytate, Dipropylene Glycol, Allantoin, Hydroxyacetophenone, Polyglyceryl-10 Laurate, Sodium Heparin, Cynanchum Atratum Extract, Althaea Rosea Flower Extract, Artemisia Princeps Leaf Extract, Tocopherol, 4-Terpineol, Capryloyl Salicylic Acid, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Pentylene Glycol, Caprylyl/Capryl Glucoside, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Ceramide NP

reviews.title: Life saving !!!
reviews.content:
This toner is a total game-changer for anyone looking to brighten and hydrate their skin. The first thing you'll notice is the luxurious texture – it's a serum-toner hybrid, so it feels more substantial than a typical toner, but still absorbs quickly. It's packed with ingredients like white truffle, niacinamide, and various plant extracts that work together to even out skin tone, boost radiance, and provide deep hydration.

The application is a breeze. You can either pat it in with your hands or use a cotton pad. It absorbs quickly, leaving your skin feeling plump and refreshed, not sticky or greasy. Over time, I've noticed a visible improvement in my skin's brightness and overall texture. It's also helped to minimize the appearance of pores.

Overall, the d'Alba Vita Toning Serum Toner is a fantastic product. It's a bit of a splurge, but the results are worth it. If you're looking for a toner that delivers on its promises of brightening & hydrating. I’d give a solid 10/10

description:
Description
100% Korean Mugwort, Low pH(5.5) Vegan Toner
With 10,000ppm of rice bran water

Artemisia, a time-tested popular skin remedy in Korea, serves as a potent antioxidant, effectively reducing inflammation and providing soothing, nurturing care for the skin. Meticulously extracted Korean mugwort ensures the full soothing energy is captured in one bottle. Infused with rice bran water and 4 types of hyaluronic acids, our artemisia toner is the perfect first step for achieving bouncy and glowing skin. Formulated without parabens, artificial fragrances, and certified vegan, it's gentle on sensitive skin, ensuring no irritation.WHY IT'S SPECIAL• 80% of Artemisia Water:
Artemisia, a time-tested popular skin remedy in Korea, is a strong antioxidant, effectively calming inflammation and providing soothing and nurturing care for the skin.• Rice Bran Water 10,000PPM:Helps brighten complexion and provides skin-nourishing oils, resulting in glowy, bouncy skin.• Multi-Layer Hydration:Features 4 types of hyaluronic acids to deeply hydrate every layer of the skin. Ideal for dry, tight, sensitized, dehydrated oily, tired, and dull skin.• Hypoallergenic test completed• Skin safety test completed• Vegan certified• Fungal acne safe
 
How To UseAt the first step of your skincare routine, apply a few drops onto your hands and gently pat onto your face to aid absorption.Tips!1) For a cleaner and refreshed feeling, dampen cotton pads and gently swipe across your face as a daily gentle exfoliator.2) For prolonged hydration, apply additional layers of toner onto your face. The more layers you apply, the more hydrated your skin will be!3) Keep a spray bottle handy to mist your face whenever you need a hydration boost. 
Key Ingredients100% Korean ArtemisiaArtemisia contains anti-inflammatory, antibacterial/antifungal and antioxidant properties that help calm even the most sensitive skins. This time-tested ingredient not only calms, soothes and heals skin, it also absorbs well into the skin, revealing a healthy, flawless complexion. Artemisia extract rich with vitamin E also helps to promote cell turnover and skin recovery while keeping the skin moisture balanced.
Rice bran waterPassed down through long generations, rice is a staple in traditional Asian beauty skincare ritual. It is a vital source of vitamins A, as well as naturally moisturizing proteins. Harness the power of rice water to remove impurities for soft, smooth and luminous skin.
 Hymagic-4DContains Hyacross, HA, Hymagic-AcHA and miniHA (in simpler terms, 4 different types of hyaluronic acids) that hydrates every single layer of your skin and locks moisture between skin layers to prevent it from escaping sneakily under dry weather.

product_name: Meoru Podo VitaC Dark Spot Pad (60ea)
description:
Description


[CONTAINS VITAMIN C] Combining Vitamin C derivatives with the antioxidant-rich grape extract provides a more effective whitening effect.
[IMPROVES SKIN TONE AND BLEMISHES] Formulated with a three-step whitening filtration process that aligns with the principles of melanin production, and contains Niacinamide, it helps make skin clear and bright.
[RADIANT AND GLOW SKIN] As important as a bright skin tone is hydrated and firm skin. With 10 types of hyaluronic acid for intense moisture and grape extract for elasticity, this product allows for easy care to achieve radiant, supple skin.
[SOOTHING AND NON-IRRITATION] Four types of Cica calming ingredients soothe rough and irritated skin, and the gentle pads are suitable for sensitive skin.
We provide you with the most specialized skincare solution for your skin with dine ingredients and a definite effect.
 
How To Use

As a toner: After cleansing, sweep over your face using one side. Then swipe once again, flipping over to the opposite side to pick up any stubborn dust and dirt.
As a mask: Create a quick S.O.S mask pack by placing a pad over the area of concern. Press gently and smooth over your skin to ensure it has stuck, and then leave for 5-10 mins. Peel away and pat the remaining essence into the skin.
Bonus tip for warm weather: Put this tub in the fridge prior to use for an extra cooling effect.
 
Key Ingredients
Water, Glycerin, Dipropylene Glycol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Niacinamide, Butylene Glycol, Carbomer, 3-O-Ethyl Ascorbic Acid (Ethyl Ascorbyl Ether), PPG-13-Decyltetradeceth-24, Melia Azadirachta Flower Extract, Tromethamine, Adenosine, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Fruit Extract, Disodium EDTA, Coccinia Indica Fruit Extract, Gluconolactone, Allantoin, Tranexamic Acid, Prunus Mume Fruit Extract, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Extract, Carica Papaya (Papaya) Fruit Extract, Fragaria Chiloensis (Strawberry) Fruit Extract, Vaccinium Angustifolium (Blueberry) Fruit Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Arctostaphylos Uva-Ursi Leaf Extract, Rubus Fruticosus (Blackberry) Fruit Extract, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Flower Extract, Resveratrol, Borago Officinalis Extract, Centaurea Cyanus Flower Extract, Salvia Sclarea (Clary) Extract, Hyacinthus Orientalis (Hyacinth) Extract, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Cynanchum Atratum Extract, Madecassoside, Asiaticoside, Citric Acid, Ethylhexylglycerin, Hyaluronic Acid, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Hydroxypropyltrimonium Hyaluronate, Hydrolyzed Sodium Hyaluronate, Potassium Hyaluronate, Pentylene Glycol, Tocopherol, Madecassic Acid, Sodium Hyaluronate Crosspolymer, Asiatic Acid, Sodium Acetylated Hyaluronate

This trial kit contains travel-friendly versions of products from Celimax’s popular Dual Barrier line, making it ideal for those who are new to the brand or need a convenient set for on-the-go skincare.

 Apply a small amount of toner, serum, and cream after cleansing and massage gently until they are absorbed.

description:
Description


MIGUHARA Cica Bakuchiol Cleanse Toner is a Korean skincare product that is designed to cleanse and tone the skin while also providing sosoothing benefits. It contains cica extract, bakuchiol, and other botanical ingredients that are known for their anti-inflammatory and healing properties.
Cica extract is derived from the centella asiatica plant, which has been used in traditional Chinese medicine for centuries to treat skin conditions such as eczema and psoriasis. It is known for its ability to promote wound healing and reduce inflammation.
Bakuchiol is a plant-based retinol alternative that is gentler on the skin. It is effective in reducing the appearance of wrinkles, fine lines, and hyperpigmentation.
Here are some of the benefits of using the miguhara cica bakuchiol cleanse toner:
-Cleanses and tones the skin without stripping it of its natural oils
-Soothes and calms irritated skin
-Reduces inflammation
-Promotes wound healing
-Reduces the appearance of wrinkles, fine lines, and hyperpigmentation

description:
Description


During the Joseon Dynasty, rice bran water, known as migamsu, was used to beautify the skin, much like today's toner or essence. Glow Replenishing Rice Milk modernizes this tradition to maximize skincare benefits. The nutrient-rich rice extract and rice amino acids penetrate deeply to hydrate and smooth dry, rough skin. This toner features a unique dual-layer formula: a moisture layer filled with rice extract for hydration and a powder layer to control sebum. It helps soothe sensitive skin and create a smoother texture, making it an ideal choice for achieving a radiant complexion..

- Deep Hydration from within & Antioxidant Protection
Formulated with rice extract and rice amino acids, this toner enhances antioxidant and moisturizing effects, providing deep hydration that prevents inner skin dryness and keeps your skin comfortable and moisturized all day long.

- Refreshing Dual-Layer Formula
Featuring a unique dual-layer formula, it has a moisture layer filled with rice extract and a powder layer to control sebum. This combination delivers a non-greasy, fresh finish. The sebum control powder helps absorb sebum and care for pores, making it beneficial for red or acne-prone skin.


- Versatile Daily Toner for All Seasons
Suitable for use in all four seasons, this daily toner combines the deep moisturizing properties reminiscent of Ginseng Essence Water with the refreshing sensation of Green Plum Refreshing Toner. Adaptable to various skin types, it caters to your skin's changing needs throughout the year.

Key Ingredients
Rice Extract
Rich in vitamins, minerals, and antioxidants, rice extract helps restore the skin's natural health, leaving it clear and radiant.

Rice Amino Acid
Extracted under optimal conditions from rice cells and callus, this ingredient increases amino acid content, aiding in antioxidant and moisturizing effects.

Sebum Control Powder
This ingredient helps absorb sebum, care for pores, and purify the skin, soothing sensitive and reddened skin while keeping it hydrated.

description:
Description

A lightweight toner that provides a refreshing splash of instant hydration that floods the skin with moisture for a healthy-looking glow. This super-hydrating water-based toner is formulated with sodium hyaluronate, soothing honeysuckle and moisture-locking baobab. The lightweight formula also has a satin-like finish for a softer and healthier-looking complexion.

How To Use

1. After cleansing, moisten a cotton pad and gently sweep across the face or dispense a dime-sized amount into palm and gently press into the face.
2. For best results use twice daily, morning and evening, after cleansing the face and before moisturizer.
Key Ingredients
- Honeysuckle : Helps to soothe and calm the skin  
- Baobab : Helps lock in moisture and prevent water loss  
- Sodium Hyaluronate : Helps keep skin hydrated

description:
Description


- The Pine Cica Toner effectively eliminates debris and dead skin cells, which can clog pores and cause skin blemishes. Additionally, it aids in smoothing the skin's rough texture for a more refined appearance.

- With 41% Pine Cica Activer, a unique ingredient that combines Pine Leaf Extract, and 3 types of Hylaruronic Acid, the Pine Calming Cica Toner works swiftly to address skin troubles caused by external stimuli and to expedite skin restoration.

- The gentle acidic pH (pH 4-6) of the product assists in restoring the natural balance of the skin. Size: 8.4 fl. oz (250ml)

How To Use

After cleansing the face, sufficiently soak a cotton pad with an appropriate amount of the toner. Gently wipe along the skin texture to smooth it out.

Key Ingredients
Hyarulonic Acid pumps up hydration, leading to smooth and radiant skin.

With smaller molecule size, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid permeates deeper and better into skin. Helps reduce visibility of fine lines and wrinkles by restoring moisture. Plumps up skin and hydrates dry skin.

Asiatic Acid is a potent antioxidant and reduces inflammation for agitated skin

Madecassic Acid smooths skin over by reducing inflammation, redness, dryness and helps with skin conditions such as acne or rosacea.

Capryloyl Salicylic Acid helps improve the appearance of fine lines and hyper-pigmentation.

product_name: *renewal* Green Plum Refreshing Toner : AHA + BHA 150ml
description:
Description

Ideal for use in the morning and evening during the first step of skin care to wipe away residual waste and smooth out the skin texture. 
Light and mild toner that can wipe away dead skin cells and sebum in the pores and on the surface of the skin that can remain after cleansing.
The main ingredient is plum, which has been used as an herbal medicine for a long time. As a cosmetic ingredient, plum helps to remove dead skin cells and care for skin texture. It creates wonderful synergy with mung bean extract, a skin soothing ingredient, and the chemical exfoliants AHA and BHA.

After cleansing in the morning and evening, moisten a cotton pad and gently wipe the skin from the inside to the outside.

reviews.title: AMAZING
reviews.content: Previously, my forehead had many bumps. It was mainly due to my oily t-zone but I never figured out how to take them out. I was scrolling on TikTok and heard about the Dokdo toner. Did some research and decided to buy it. First, when I applied the toner, I thought it was going to be drying BUT after a few minutes of letting it dry, my skin was not dry!!! It felt as if I applied lotion (after letting it dry ofc) and was not burning! After falling asleep, I woke up and my skin was feeling AMAZING! A few days passed and my bumps in my forehead disappeared. Although my forehead currently has some bumps bc of stress, I HIGHLY recommend people to try this out!

description:
Description


Ginseng has been a cherished herb in Korean history, renowned for its benefits to our overall health and particularly our skin.
Our Ginseng Essence Water, made with 80% ginseng water, harnesses the natural power of ginseng, nourishing and hydrating the skin deeply. 
This essence not only supplies your skin with ample moisture and nutrients but also ensures long-lasting hydration.
- Uniform skin tone : This essence calms down the skin surface where dead skin cells occur and helps make the skin tone even by improving the skin texture to be smooth and bright.
- Nutrient Supply : It is an essence type that contains niacinamide, which helps to balance the moisture level of the skin and protect it from external stimuli while forming a strong moisture barrier on the skin.
- Intensive Moisture Supply : Containing 80% ginseng water, it helps to maintain deep moisture in the skin for a long time and keeps the skin healthy.
How To Use
After cleansing, pour a few drops into your hands and pat gently onto the face.
Key Ingredients
- Ginseng root water 80% + Ginseng complex : In Donguibogam, a Korean herbal medicine book, ginseng was used as an important oriental medicine and recorded as 'Shincho', meaning herb from the gods. Hwang Jini, known as the most beautiful woman in the Joseon Dynasty, used a ginseng decoction as a bath water. The rich saponin contained in ginseng helps to quickly supply moisture to the skin and maintain it deep inside the skin for a long time to help create healthy skin.
- Niacinamide 2% : Niacinamide is helpful in controlling sebum secretion and maintaining the oil and moisture balance of the skin.

reviews.title: Toner
reviews.content: Skincare is a commitment to maintaining the health and vitality of the skin. Proper skincare routine includes habits & products for cleansing, hydrating, and protecting from environmental damage. Skincare is not merely a cosmetic concern; it’s essential for various reasons, primarily because the skin serves as a protective barrier against harmful elements like pollutants and UV rays. Neglecting skincare can cause acne, premature ageing, compromised immunity, etc. An effective skincare routine often includes cleansing, toning, and moisturising. Hydration is equally important, as it maintains the skin's moisture balance, preventing dryness and flakiness. Additionally, skincare routines often involve the use of sunscreen to shield the skin from the damaging effects of the sun's ultraviolet rays. This is especially pertinent in countries like India, where the sun's intensity is high, emphasising the importance of sun protection for skin health.

A pure blend of naturally fermented black rice and bamboo shoot extracts, this toner provides a boost of antioxidant-rich nourishment to your face for amplified protection. 

Black rice is rich in anti-oxidants and is full of highly concentrated polyphenol and flavonoid pigments which protects skin against free radicals, including ultraviolet radiation and pollution, and encourage new cell growth.

description:
Description


Moisture toner with vitamin B5 and hyaluronic acid which makes your skin more dewy with full of hydration. 






●Extra large toner 280ml(9.46 fl.oz)

 

Enjoy our extra large toner as you wish to achieve the results you want!


 



● Skin health recovering toner with Hydrium Synergy-8 Complex



 



Not only it's moisturizing toner but also it's the foundation of skin health recovering skincare step.



With Hydrium Synergy-8 Complex which is consist ofsix types of hyaluronic acids, d-panthenol and allantoin,



this toner fills up your skin deep with moisture and helps keep hydrated for a long time.



 

● Sufficient volume toner enables you to use multipurpose



 



Plentiful quantity for using multipurpose.



This toner can be used when you wipe away residue after cleansing and when you pat onto your skin.



If your skin feels extra dry and heated, you can soak the cotton pads with this toner and use as toner sheet mask.



 



Also can be used as a mist so that you can spray on your face when you feel dryness during the day.



 



Lastly, you can wash your face with the toner when your skin stimulated with dryness.



Just mix this toner and water by the ratio of 8 : 2, and rinse your face at the last of cleansing routine.



Don't wipe your face with a towel just tap gently in order for it to be absorbed along the skin texture.



Suggested Use

reviews.title: Good body exfoliation
reviews.content: Chose this to use for my arms and legs in the PM before moisturizing several nights a week. 4-5 weeks to pan. I chose it because it’s super affordable for the price & size, & because it contains glycolic, lactic, and salicylic acids all in one. The bumps on my arms have improved immensely! KP on my legs is slow but steady improvement. Watery texture, slight but not unpleasant scent that disappears quickly. Theres a slight stick left on the skin, but if you’re moisturizing afterwards, it’s not an issue.

reviews.title: Great body exfoliating
reviews.content: The label seems infantile, but this is a good exfoliating toner. Glycolic, lactic, and salicylic acids cover all the bases. It leaves a slight tack, so I recommend using before moisturizing. I’m able to use this on my body daily, and it’s helped with bumps and KP a lot.

TARGETS
